entry.source: {F812}Ogun\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350301}Look at this power... This is the{F801}power that's going to save this{F801}country.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350302}That's right. Fighting is what will{F801}save this nation. I have come to{F801}teach these people the ways of war!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350303}I will show these people the truth{F801}and guide them into a new era.{F801}Any who stand in my way will perish!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Ogun\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350301}Look at this power... This is the{F801}power that's going to save this{F801}country.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350302}That's right. Fighting is what will{F801}save this nation. I have come to{F801}teach these people the ways of war!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350303}I will show these people the truth{F801}and guide them into a new era.{F801}Any who stand in my way will perish!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ogun\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350304}I... I was... going to guide these{F801}people... to a revolution...{F801}
